column4: mm how do I install my Linksys WMP54G wireless PCI card on Ubuntu 8.04?
do this : lspci on terminal and see what cards it lists if urs
u have linux driver for it?
harpeet: well there is no Linux driver at the Linksys CDrom that came with the WMP54G card
yes I loaded the driver in ndiswrapper and it says rt61 / hardware availabke: yes
but it doesnt seem to show up as wlam0
like: the Os doesnt seem to know theres actually a wireless device
ok how else can I make it to work?
yes but i dont know what to do with this info
wols; like see if synaptics has a rt61?
u have to download rt61 then i guess
